extension.parser
Class DependencyParser

java.lang.Object
  extension.parser.DependencyParser

public class DependencyParser
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Lea Haensenberger (lhaensenberger at students.unibe.ch) This class gets the value from the Annotation Depends and extracts method names and parameters. with this information it creates a List of Method Objects which represent the dependencies of the current test method.
